name: ALLEGORY PLANET B SERIE  : I AM A GENIUS

metadata.name: PLANET B SERIE  : I AM A GENIUS
metadata.description:
NFT BASED ON OIL PAINTING BY BORIS FOSCOLO (ARTFOSCOLO).
 The concept raises questions about the place of HUMAN CIVILIZATION and in relation to its environment: biodiversity, nature, culture... The absurdity of being human etc... it is an allegory about our way of life...
